General.Name: Ecomiam SA
General.Description: écomiam SA operates stores that sells food products in France. Its stores sell appetizers, including bites, cakes, deli, aperitif packages, and other appetizers; poultry, beef, pork, ground and organic meat, meat packages, and meats for animals; fish and seafoods; vegetables and potatoes; culinary aids comprising onion, garlic, shallot, aromatic herbs, sauces, pranks, broths, and culinary aid packages; croque monsieur and panini, puff pastries, patties, pizza and flamekueche, and other products; bread and Viennese pastries; logs, pancakes and waffles, fruits and sauces, and ice cream; and organic products. The company also sells its products online. écomiam SA was founded in 2009 and is based in Quimper, France.
General.Address: 161 route de Brest Zone de Gourvily, Quimper, France, 29000
